sect1.title: lximage-qt-&lximage-qt-version;

sect2.title: Installation of lximage-qt
sect2.para: Install lximage-qt by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
sed -i 's/1%/%1/' src/translations/lximage-qt_pt_BR.ts &&
sed -i 's/Utility;//' data/lximage-qt.desktop.in &&
mkdir -v build && cd build &&
cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=$LXQT_PREFIX \ .. &&
LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/qt5/lib:$LXQT_PREFIX/lib make

sect2.para: This package does not come with a test suite.
If you have installed, as the root user, run xdg-icon-resource forceupdate --theme hicolor.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: sed -i ... src/translations/lximage-qt_pt_BR.t: Fixes a bug introduced by the translation. If you will never use pt_BR as the prefix of your locale, this fix can be safely ignored.
sed -i ... data/lximage-qt.desktop.in: Fixes submenu for lximage-qt.
LIBRARY_PATH=/opt/qt5/lib:$LXQT_PREFIX/lib: Fixes for the linker to find three libraries.

listitem.para: is a lightweight image viewer and screenshot program. There is a menu entry at Utilities for the screenshot program. From command line, obtain a full screen or window shot by running lximage-qt --screenshot.
